name: 蘇倚德
objective:
本課程設計重視學生出席及參與程度，強調課堂互動及團體分組。

智慧財產權管理以貼近商業活動的「商標法」及「營業秘密法」為例，代入「品牌管理」及「資訊管理」之法律基礎，又於相應主題補充相關著作權、專利權及等智慧財產法律知識，並擬邀請業師分享實務經驗，以達實務與理論相輔相成的功效。

This course is designed to emphasize student attendance and active participation, with a focus on classroom interaction and group collaboration.

Intellectual property management is explored through the practical lenses of trademark law and trade secret law, which are closely tied to business activities. These legal foundations are integrated into topics such as brand management and information management. 

Additionally, relevant knowledge of copyright, patent law, and other intellectual property laws will be supplemented in corresponding areas. Practitioners from the industry are also invited to share their professional experiences, achieving a synergy between theory and practice.

課程以老師自編講義以及其他參考資料為主。
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG8：尊嚴就業與經濟發展（Decent Work and Economic Growth）SDG16：和平正義與有力的制度（Peace, Justice and Strong Institutions）
